name: BABY JOY Foldable High Chair, Portable Highchairs for Babies and Toddlers with 3-Position Adjustable Tray & Footrest, Removable Seat Cushion, 5-Point Safety Harness, Space Saving Design (Coffee)
short_description: Adjustable Baby High Chair: Featuring a 3-position adjustable tray, the high chair provides a cozy place for babies of different sizes, accompanying your little one to grow up. It is ideal for babies and toddlers of 6-36 months. Moreover, the 3-position footrest helps babies find the optimal sitting posture.

Foldable & Portable Design: Thanks to the one-click folding mechanism, the high chair is easy to fold for space-saving storage or convenient travel. Your child will have a comfortable seat wherever you go. Folded size: 23.5" x 3" x 28.5" (L x W x H); Net weight: 10 lbs.

Easy to Clean: The removable seat cushion and food tray make cleaning a breeze. The PU cushion is skin-friendly and waterproof, quick to wipe down. More, the heat resistant food tray is dishwasher safe, ensuring effortless cleanups after messy meals.

Safety Comes First: This ASTM and CPSIA compliant baby feeding chair is made with BPA-free PP food tray and sturdy metal legs. Plus, 5-point safety harness, anti-falling baffle and anti-slip feet add extra security.

Simple Assembly Required: The folding high chairs for babies and toddlers comes almost pre-assembled. You only needed to install the tray and footrest following step-by-step instructions. Overall dimension: 28.5" x 23.5" x 41"/72 cm x 60 cm x 104 cm (L x W x H).
product_description: Description: Are you looking for a functional feeding chair for your baby? Our foldable baby high chair will be an ideal option. The skin-friendly PU seat cushion ensures comfy seating. With tray adjustment button and footrest adjustment button, the tray and the footrest can be adjusted in 3 positions, meeting babies’ needs of different growing stages. The removable and dishwasher-safe tray is also super easy to clean. 5-point safety harness and anti-falling baffle are included for excellent security. It also complies with ASTM/ CPSIA. If needed, you can fold it into a compact size for easy storage. The folded high chair is easy to transport. Set it up to let your child enjoy mealtime with your child wherever you go. Features: 3-position adjustable design of tray and footrest for customized comfort The food tray is also suitable for playing High-quality PU seat cushion for ultimate comfort 5-point safety harness and anti-falling baffle for safe sitting ASTM/ CPSIA compliant for safe use Easy detachment of tray and seat cushion allows for easy cleaning Quick folding for compact storage Light weight for easy transport Stable & safe structure for strong support Anti-slip foot pads increase overall steadiness Assembly required Specifications: Color: Coffee/Green/Gray Material: PP + PU + Metal Product Dimensions: 28.5" x 23.5" x 41"/72 cm x 60 cm x 104 cm (L x W x H) Folded Dimension: 23.5" x 3" x 28.5"/60 cm x 7 cm x 72 cm (L x W x H) Tray Dimension: 17.5" x 8.5"/44 cm x 21 cm(L x W) Suitable Age: 6 Months-3 Years old Weight Capacity: 33 lbs/15 kg Net Weight: 10 lbs/4.5 kg Package Includes: 1 x Folding High Chair 1 x User Guide

name: Bright Starts Pop 'N Sit Portable Booster, Indoor/Outdoor Use, Floor Seat with Feeding Tray, Grey, 6 Mos - 3 Yrs
short_description: Bright Starts Pop N Sit is the ultimate go & grow seat! 3 modes of use: floor seat, feeding seat with removable tray, and toddler booster; great for days out, evenings in, weekend trips & more
Safe for indoor and outdoor use. Pull up a seat for park picnics, camping trips, and visits to grandmas house; includes a carrying bag with shoulder strap to bring along on all your adventures
Compact chair easily folds to 5 x 15 inches; easy to clean with dishwasher safe tray and machine washable seat pad; includes a rear storage pocket for little essentials
Gender neutral grey design; includes 3-point safety harness, BPA free tray, and safety straps for attaching to adult chair; rated for ages 6 months to 3 years or up to 33 pounds
A must-have item for parents on the go, grandparents & more! Great gift idea for baby showers, birthdays, Christmas, and other gifting occasions; no tools required for assembly
product_description: With over 2 million sold, the original Pop N Sit portable booster seat joins the Bright Starts collection of products to help families find more joy in every moment. From inside to outside, baby to toddler, and mealtime to playtime, this multi-purpose travel booster offers your little one a secure place to sit. This #1 Booster Seat* from the #1 Manufacturer of Feeding Boosters** features 3 modes of use: floor seat for baby, feeding seat with removable tray, and toddler booster. For babies, attach to an adult chair using the included straps and BPA free tray to create a portable chair top high chair. For toddlers, use the seat as a booster that can pull up to the table by removing the tray. In floor mode for baby, you can use the Pop N Sit whenever you need an extra seat - picnics, sporting events, or right at home! The rear storage pocket holds your daily essentials. Folds compactly when not in use and includes a carrying bag with shoulder strap and extra pocket. Features a dishwasher safe tray and machine washable seat pad. Dimensions: 15 x 13.5 x 14.75 or 5 x 15 when folded. Made for 6 months to 3 years old or up to 33 pounds. Gender neutral grey color. Third party safety tested and approved. (*Circana, Retail Tracking Service, U.S., Highchairs-Boosters, dollar sales, Jan-Nov 2023 combined); over 2 million sold worldwide. **Circana, Retail Tracking Service, U.S., Highchairs-Boosters, dollar sales, 12 months ending October 2023)
product_details: Care instructions ‎Frame: Wipe with a damp cloth, mild soap, and warm water. Never use bleach or detergent. Fabric and Bag: Remove fabric from frame. Lock restraint buckles and place in a laundry bag. Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Line or hang dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean. Tray: Dishwasher safe, top rack only.
Additional product features ‎Dishwasher Safe Tray, Safety Straps, Washable Seat Pad
